review: Wish I had been using for years.  Much simpler to install and use than I anticipated (anxiety was unfounded).  Can't believe all I get for the small purchase price.  Just love everything about this and have been telling family and friends all over the country, especially those who do not have cable, to get this.
author: Gordon F.

review: It's wonderful. It's so easy, and works really well. I'd recommend it to anyone!
author: Michelle

review: Works ok for most services but mine will not allow Netflix to load.  It says Netflix is busy and to try again later.  Netflix works fine on the "Roku and the Netgear devices.  I think Amazon forces Netflix to not work properly.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love the Fire TV Stick.  Will never be at a loss for movie or TV to watch again - Thanks Amazon!
author: Not Given

review: The best thing ever made i get most of my shows on hula, have Netflix and amazon prime and now hbo go added to the mix able to listen to my Pandora also the best purchase i have ever made with amazon.
author: Debra Hines

review: This worked really well after I resolved the problem with my internet connection.
author: Brenda Partridge

review: Really works well!!! I think it has more capabilities  than I realize. ..
author: Bonnie Heimerman

review: My Fire TV Stick arrived in the mail and within 10 minutes I had access to a variety of programming.  Since I ordered it off Amazon, it came with my Amazone Prime already pre-registered which was great! I love this thing.  Honestly, for the low price of $39.00 I don't know why I waited so long to order it.  I love it my Amazon Fire TV Stick!
author: Lisa F "catznipp"
